Mochi (the food)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): Mochi (the food)
By Lisa Shock on Friday, July 7, 2006 - 10:40 am:

I have spent the past week at the World Pastry Forum, and yesterday I took classes with chefs from Japan! I made several kinds of mochi from scratch, as well as other traditional sweets.

Did you know that mochi should always be accompanied by tea? Every year several people die from choking on it because they didn't drink tea with it -it's pretty sticky stuff. I think this explains why Mocchis often ask for Colart tea, or have it as a favorite very frequently.

By RPGDesigner on Friday, July 7, 2006 - 11:34 am:

What a fickle dish.

I'll take nine.

By Sturnum94 on Friday, July 7, 2006 - 06:20 pm:

That is very intriguing. No wonder my mocchi always asked me for this. The part about people dying from not accompanying it with tea sounds very...dark and makes you think twice about eating sticky stuff. I'll now eat my peanut butter sandwich with milk.

By Scorpio Maurus on Friday, July 28, 2006 - 02:02 am:

Cool I didn't know that. That's pretty cool thanks for the info. Of course I have a hard time saying no to my monsters so I always gave Mocchi the Tea anyhow. I really Wish they'd bring back the Monsters ability to ask you to play with it. I loved having Mudball/Snowball fights.

By Monster_Royale on Sunday, July 30, 2006 - 10:19 am:

Yah, I saw the Mocchi food in the anime....looked kinda tasy.
